original_text: And they shall bind the breastpiece by its rings to the rings of the ephod with a lace of blue, so that it may lie on the skillfully woven band of the ephod, so that the breastpiece shall not come loose from the ephod.
korean_text: 청색 끈으로 흉패 고리와 에봇 고리에 꿰어 흉패로 정교하게 짠 에봇 띠 위에 붙여 떨어지지 않게 하라

sentences.original_text: And they shall bind the breastpiece
by its rings to the rings of the ephod
so that it may lie on the skillfully woven band of the ephod
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 에봇의 공교하게 짠 띠 위에 놓이게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: so that the breastpiece shall not come loose from the ephod
sentences.korean_translation: 가슴받이가 에봇에서 떨어지지 않게 하려 함이라
